attributes.action: order the appropriate minister to instruct all Local Authorities to put street signs at ALL corners of all streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The obvious reason for this petition is that it would enable people visiting an unfamiliar area to know where they are!  Of course it would be possible to ask someone but sometimes there isn't anyone around to ask and in any case where does that leave people with speech or hearing impairment?
